activities:
Recurly provides subscription billing services for hundreds of organizations.  In order to provide subscription billing services, we store customer billing information, including credit card details for end customers.

Recurly is PCI-DSS Level 1 compliant, and does not engage in any activities related to sharing, selling, trading or disclosing personally identifiable information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, Customer, Billing information (Name, Billing Address, Email Address, Credit Card)
